column2: it's disappointing to hear that your food was over seasoned. Our kitchen team is always careful to season our dishes in a way that will elevate the flavors and highlight the details of each dish
column3: and we apologize that we missed the mark for you. It's lovely to hear that your service was superior
column4: and we sincerely hope you'll allow us another chance to serve you a delicious meal. If you have further input
column5: don't hesitate to reach out to Tina Majethia
